sen.j: 作太郎と作次郎と呼ばれる2人の立会人が、「日柄改め」から「狩終い」までの稲作の過程を模擬的に演じるもので、早乙女に扮した女の子4人と、牛役の男の子1人が出て、ショウブの葉を苗に見立てて田植えのしぐさをし、豊作を祈願する。
sen.e: Observers called Sakutaro and Sakujiro act out a simulated process of rice cultivation from 'Higara aratame' to 'Shuoi,' and four girls disguised as young female rice planters and one boy playing the role of the cow appear to do gestures of rice planting using iris leaves as rice seedlings, and pray for an abundant harvest.
